title: When will the NIOS class 12 results 2020 be out? - Quora

response.answer_text: The National Institute of Open Schooling will be declaring the NIOS 12th Result 2020 for the March-April examinations soon. NIOS 12th examinations which were postponed due to COVID-19 have now been cancelled. For the NIOS 2020 examinations, the NIOS 12th Result will be prepared based on the assessment scheme. The assessment scheme has been provided below for the reference of students. NIOS 12th Result 2020 can be expected in the last week of July/First week of August. Once declared, students will be able to check their NIOS 12th Result 2020 through the official website of NIOS using their enrolment number.
